name: teljira-sprintfLow-monolith
description: TELJIRA Monolith (SprintFlow): Jira-like work management app

scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install || true
scripts.setup: cd backend && npm run migrate && npm run seed && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
